a.title: When to keep your child home from school

div.a: When to keep your child home from school

span.style: font-size: 12pt; letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 12pt; letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

div.span: Dear Staff, Parents and Students, (Spanish translation below)

span.style: font-size: 12pt; letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);
font-size: 12pt; letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

div.span: NMSD staff and administration are working hard to support you during this COVID-19 pandemic and want to reassure you that we will get through this together. This is a difficult and troubling time for many of us, but we are here to help.We are all adjusting to anew way of schooling and being quarantined in our homes.Social/physical distancing(of at least 6 feet away from others) is difficult and trying, but so important if we are to slowthe spread of COVID-19. We cannot tell who is infected and potentially contagious, as some people may have mild to no symptoms. For our own safety, the safety of others and to slow the spread of the virus please do your part to observe social distancing at the workplace and in stores. Stay home as much as possible and only with those in our immediate households.We care about you and your families and are ready to help you along the way.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
color: rgb(80, 0, 80);
color: rgb(0, 32, 96);
color: rgb(80, 0, 80);
color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

div.span:
We can get lost and overwhelmed in all the information that we come across. It is best to minimize our media time and use reliable and accurate sources for our information, like:
Oregon Health Authority
(OHA)https://govstatus.egov.com/OR-OHA-COVID-19
Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html
World Health Organization (WHO)https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019
Oregon Department of Education (ODE)https://www.oregon.gov/ode/students-and-family/healthsafety/Pages/COVID19.aspx

span.style: color: rgb(80, 0, 80);
color: rgb(0, 32, 96);
color: rgb(80, 0, 80);
color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

div.span: Below are links on ways we can keep informed and stay healthy:

span.style: color: rgb(80, 0, 80);
color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

li.span: Refer to ourNM Community Resourcepage for emergency numbers, local food pantries, health centers, and community resources, etc.

span.style: color: rgb(80, 0, 80);
color: rgb(0, 32, 96);
span.a: "What is COVID-19?"is a great video made for children by Jamie Trzebiatowski (a school nurse).

span.style: color: rgb(80, 0, 80);
color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

li.span: Use theHousehold Checklist to help you plan and make decisions now that will protect you and your family during the COVID-19 outbreak.

span.style: color: rgb(80, 0, 80);
color: rgb(0, 32, 96);
span.a: Steps to Stay Safetells you how to keep safe wherever you are.

span.style: color: rgb(80, 0, 80);
color: rgb(0, 32, 96);
span.a: Take Care of Your Emotional Healthis important for all of us.

span.style: color: rgb(80, 0, 80);
color: rgb(0, 32, 96);
span.a: Myth bustinginaccurate information you have seen.

span.style: color: rgb(80, 0, 80);
color: rgb(0, 32, 96);
letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);
color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

li.span: As we all continue taking precautions during the spread of COVID-19, BrainPOP is here to help you and your curious learners stay informed and on-track. BrainPOP is offering free family access during the COVID-19 school closure.Click here

span.style: color: rgb(0, 32, 96);
letter-spacing: 0.333333px; font-size: medium; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

p.span: If you have symptomsof fever, cough, or breathing problems stay home and call your doctor. If breathing difficulty or shortness of breath is mild, do not delay in calling your doctor. If it is severe, call 911.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

p.span: If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.333333px; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

p.span: As your District School Nurse, I am available to you via phone (503-678-7140) and welcomeyourcalls from 8 am - 4 pm Monday - Friday. We need to support each other, so please reach out to me ifyou have any questions or concerns.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
letter-spacing: 0.333333px; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(80, 0, 80);
color: rgb(0, 32, 96);
letter-spacing: 0.333333px; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(80, 0, 80);
color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

p.span: El personal y la administracin de NMSD estn trabajando arduamente para apoyarlo durante esta pandemia de COVID-19 y quieren asegurarle que lo superaremos juntos. Este es un momento difcil y problemtico para muchos de nosotros, pero estamos aqu para ayudar. Todos nos estamos adaptando a una nueva forma de escolarizacin y a estar en cuarentena en nuestros hogares. El distanciamiento social (a 6 pies de distancia de los dems) es difcil y difcil, pero tan importante si queremos frenar la propagacin de COVID-19. No podemos saber quin est infectado y es potencialmente contagioso, ya que algunas personas pueden tener sntomas leves o nulos. Por nuestra propia seguridad, la seguridad de los dems y para frenar la propagacin del virus, haga su parte para observar el distanciamiento social en el lugar de trabajo y en las tiendas. Qudese en casa tanto como sea posible y solo con aquellos en nuestros hogares inmediatos. Nos preocupamos por usted y sus familias y estamos listos para ayudarlo en el camino.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 32, 96);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

p.span: Podemos perdernos y abrumarnos con toda la informacin que encontramos. Es mejor minimizar el tiempo de los medios y usar fuentes confiables y precisas para nuestra informacin, como:

span.style: color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

li.span: Mientras todos tomamos precauciones durante la propagacin de COVID-19, BrainPOP est aqu para ayudarlo a usted y a sus alumnos curiosos a mantenerse informados y en buen camino. BrainPOP ofrece acceso familiar gratuito durante el cierre de la escuela COVID-19.

a.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; letter-spacing: 0.333333px; text-decoration-line: none;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(80, 0, 80); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 11pt;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

p.span: Si tiene sntomas de fiebre, tos o problemas respiratorios, qudese en casa y llame a su mdico. Si la dificultad para respirar o la falta de aire es leve, no demore en llamar a su mdico. Si es grave, llame al 911.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 32, 96);

p.span: Si tiene alguna pregunta, no dude en ponerse en contacto conmigo. Como su Enfermera escolar del distrito, estoy disponible para usted por telfono (503-678-7140) y recibo sus llamadas de 8 am a 4 pm de lunes a viernes. Necesitamos apoyarnos mutuamente, as que comunquese conmigo si tiene alguna pregunta o inquietud.
